name: Reactcardz
description:
Reactcardz is an interactive and amusing card game which will test your playing skills and reaction speed. The game helps to develop communicative abilities, logical thinking and perceptiveness. It is suitable for all ages and can be played by both children and adults. Reactcardz is a great way to relax from daily routine and enjoy the leisure time with family and friends.

The goal of the game is to get rid of one’s cards faster than the other players by discarding them to the middle of the table according to their colors (red, blue, green and yellow) and rankings (from 1 to 10).

The game is unique because all the players can play simultaneously without the need to wait for their turn.
